title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 180/96 of 31 January 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the poultrymeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 180/96 of 31 January 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the poultrymeat sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 1372/95 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 January 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 77.
(2) OJ No L 305, 19. 12. 1995, p. 49.
(3) OJ No L 133, 17. 6. 1995, p. 26.
(4) OJ No L 296, 9. 12. 1995, p. 8.
